articles.content: Hidalgo County Health Authority Ivan Melendez says coming into COVID-19 units nowadays feels like going through a non-linear version of the five stages of grief: denial, anger, bargaining, depression… [+7451 chars]

articles.title: Raccoon Found In Pittsburgh Neighborhood Tests Positive For Rabies - CBS Pittsburgh
articles.description: A raccoon found in a Pittsburgh neighborhood was the first animal to test positive for rabies in Allegheny County during the new year.
articles.content:
By: KDKA-TV News Staff
PITTSBURGH (KDKA) — A raccoon from Pittsburgh’s Duquesne Heights neighborhood has tested positive for rabies. This is the first animal to test positive for rabies in Allegheny… [+790 chars]

articles.author: Ana Maldonado-Contreras
articles.title: A healthy microbiome builds a strong immune system that could help defeat COVID-19 - The Conversation US
articles.description: The microbes in your gut influence how your immune system reacts to bacteria and viruses. A severe immune reaction is deadly; a small one lets the virus win. The right balance may depend on your diet.
articles.content:
Takeaways
  • Your gut is home to trillions of bacteria that are vital for keeping you healthy.
  • Some of these microbes help to regulate the immune system.
  • New research, which… [+9052 chars]
